Exaggeration: The claim suggests that the Crist campaign website has completely eliminated all references to the Republican Party, which may be an exaggeration if there are still some mentions or links to the party.
Lack enough support: The claim does not provide specific evidence or examples to support the assertion that all references to the Republican Party have been eliminated from the website.
Problematic assumption: The claim assumes that the absence of explicit mentions of the Republican Party on the campaign website indicates a break from the party, without considering other possible reasons for the omission.
Exist alternative explanation: The claim does not explore alternative explanations for the absence of references to the Republican Party on the website, such as a strategic decision to attract broader support.
